body:
Hello, first I want to start out with an apology. I have been acting VERY immature lately, and wanted to apologize about my immature actions. Ever since I applied for Jr. Moderator I felt like this is an opportune moment for me to clean up my actions.


One fact about my life that not many of you may know about me is that, I am Autistic. I just wanted some of you guys to know, because I feel it is important to let my community know about what is going on in my personal life. If you would like to know anything more about me or what's going on in my personal life AMA!

title: Connor4961's AMA :D

replies.body:
im chill with that m8. Ik people who are, and there's huge misconceptions about it. I thing that gets to me in general is people who know nothing about stuff like this and act like they know all. 

How are you? 

Favourite thing about the server?
